Recipe.Name: Stuffed Red Peppers
Recipe.Description: Roasted red bell peppers are stuffed with feta cheese and a mixture of rice and green onions.
Recipe.Ingredients: 1. 1 cup water/n/2. 1/2 cup uncooked Arborio rice/n/3. 2 red bell peppers, halved and seeded/n/4. 1 tablespoon olive oil/n/5. 2 green onions, thinly sliced/n/6. 1 teaspoon dried basil/n/7. 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning/n/8. 1 teaspoon salt/n/9. 1 pinch ground black pepper/n/10. 1 tomato, diced/n/1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese
Recipe.Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking sheet.
2. In a medium saucepan, bring water to a boil. Stir in the rice. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat, and set aside.
3. Place the peppers cut-side down on the prepared baking sheet. Roast 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until tender and skin starts to brown.
4. While the peppers are roasting, heat oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the onions, basil, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper in oil for 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in the tomato, and cook for 5 minutes. Spoon in the cooked rice, and stir until heated through. Remove from heat, mix in the feta cheese, and spoon the mixture into the pepper halves.
5. Return to the oven for 5 minutes. Serve immediately.
Recipe.Extra: Preparation Time : approx. 30 minutes, Servings: 2 Adults

Recipe.Name: Chocolate Chip Muffin
Recipe.Description: The chocolate chip muffin are made up of Chocolate chips which are small chunks of chocolate mixed with batter and baked to have delicious taste and particularly mouth watering smell!
Recipe.Ingredients: 1. 2 cups all-purpose flour/n/2. 1/2 cup white sugar/n/3. 3 teaspoons baking powder/n/4. 1/2 teaspoon salt/n/5. 3/4 cup milk/n/6. 1/3 cup vegetable oil/n/7. 1 egg/n/8. 3/4 cup mini semi-sweet chocolate chips/n/9. 3 tablespoons white sugar/n/10. 2 tablespoons brown sugar
Recipe.Instructions:
1. Heat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C). Grease bottoms only of 12 muffin cups or line with baking cups.
2. In a medium bowl, combine flour, 1/2 cup sugar, baking powder, chocolate chips, and salt; mix well. In a small bowl, combine milk, oil and egg; blend well. Add dry ingredients all at once; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened (batter will be lumpy.)
3. Fill cups 2/3 full. Sprinkle tops of muffins before baking with a combination of 3 tablespoons sugar and 2 tablespoon brown sugar.
4. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 1 minute before removing from pan. Serve warm.
Recipe.Extra: Preparation Time : 5 mins, Cook Time: 20 mins, Servings: 2 Adults

Recipe.Name: Caesar Wrap
Recipe.Description: This wrap is so healthy and fresh! Crispy veggies and tangy mustard make this meal a real treat that you won't have to feel bad about eating. This wrap is terrific with gourmet kettle cooked potato chips!
Recipe.Ingredients: 1. 1 wrap, sliced in half/n/2. 1 tablespoon coarse-grain brown mustard/n/3. 1 leaf romaine lettuce/n/4. 2 (quater inch thick) rings green bell pepper/n/5. 4 slices cucumber/n/6. 2 slices tomato/n/7. salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste/n/8. 2 slices red onion/n/9. Half cup alfalfa sprouts
Recipe.Instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add ziti pasta, and cook until al dente, about 8 minutes; drain.
2. In a large skillet, brown onion and ground beef over medium heat. Add spaghetti sauce, and simmer 15 minutes.
3. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Butter a 9x13 inch baking dish. Layer as follows: 1/2 of the ziti, Provolone cheese, sour cream, 1/2 sauce mixture, remaining ziti, mozzarella cheese and remaining sauce mixture. Top with grated Parmesan cheese.
4. Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until cheeses are melted.
Recipe.Extra: Preparation Time : approx. 50 minutes, Servings: 4 Adults

Recipe.Name: Mango Rice Pudding
Recipe.Description: A deliciously fragrant summer dessert that is complimented by seasonal summer fruits!
Recipe.Ingredients: 1. 2.5 tablespoons butter/n/2. 1 cinnamon stick/n/3. 3 tablespoons sugar, divided/n/4. 1 ripe mango, peeled, seeded and diced/n/5. 1 teaspoon vegetable oil/n/6. 1 cup jasmine rice/n/7. 1 cup whole milk/n/8. 1.5 cups evaporated milk/n/9. 2 cups water/n/10. Zest of 1 lime/n/11. Pinch ground nutmeg
Recipe.Instructions:
1. Heat a medium-sized pot over medium heat.
2. Melt the butter.
3. Add the cinnamon stick and 1 tablespoon sugar, and stir to dissolve.
4. Add the diced mango, and saute until the mango caramelizes slightly.
5. Remove the mango mixture, leaving the cinnamon stick in the pan, and set the mango aside in a bowl.
6. In the same pan drizzle in the vegetable oil. Add the jasmine rice, and stir to coat the grains in the oil.
7. Pour in the whole milk, evaporated milk, water, lime zest, and remaining 2 tablespoon sugar, and stir to combine. Simmer the rice for 20 minutes.
8. Once the pudding is cooked, season it with the nutmeg, stir and remove the heat. Add half of the mango mixture back to the pan, and mix.
9. To serve, ladle the pudding into a bowl and garnish with the reserved mango mixture.
Recipe.Extra: Preparation Time : 20 mins, Cook Time: 20 mins, Servings: 4 Adults

Recipe.Name: Russian Salad
Recipe.Description: In modern recipes, it is usually made with diced boiled potatoes, vegetables, eggs, diced boiled chicken (or sometimes ham) and is dressed with mayonnaise. It is also known by Olivier Salad!
Recipe.Ingredients: 1. 6 potatoes, peeled/n/2. 1 carrot, or more to taste/n/3. 4 eggs/n/4. 6 large pickles, cut into cubes/n/6. 1 (15 ounce) can peas, drained/n/7. 1/2 cup cubed fully cooked ham, or to taste/n/8. 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste (optional)/n/9. 1/2 cup mayonnaise, or to taste
Recipe.Instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of water to a boil; add potatoes and carrot.
2. Return mixture to a boil and add eggs; cook until potatoes are tender, 20 to 30 minutes. Drain and slightly cool mixture.
3. Chop potatoes and carrot; peel and chop eggs.
4. Mix potatoes, carrot, eggs, pickles, peas, ham, and parsley together in a large bowl; stir in mayonnaise until salad is evenly coated.
Recipe.Extra: Preparation Time : 30 mins, Cook Time: 20 mins, Servings: 3 Adults

Recipe.Name: Vegetable Biryani
Recipe.Description: Biryani is s a rice-based dish (usually using basmati) made with spices and chicken, mutton, fish, eggs or vegetables!
Recipe.Ingredients: For the rice:/n/1. 3/4 cups basmati rice/n/2. 1 tablespoon unsalted butter/n/3. 2 tablespoons golden raisins/n/4. 2 tablespoons blanched, sliced almonds/n/5. 1/2 teaspoon turmeric/n/6. 1/4 teaspoon whole cumin seeds/n/7. 1/4 teaspoon whole coriander seeds/n/8. 3 whole cardamom pods/n/9. 1 cinnamon stick, broken in half/n/10. 1.5 cups water/n/11. 1 teaspoon kosher salt/n/For the vegetables:/n/1. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter/n/2. 1/4 small yellow onion, thinly sliced/n/3. 1 tablespoon peeled, minced fresh ginger/n/4. 2 cloves garlic, minced/n/5. 2 tablespoons golden raisins/n/6. 2 tablespoons blanched, sliced almonds/n/7. 1 1/2 teaspoons whole coriander seeds/n/8. 1/2 teaspoon whole cumin seeds/n/9. 5 whole cardamom pods/n/10. 1 cup small cauliflower florets/n/11. 3 ounces green beans, cut into 1-inch pieces/n/12. 3 small new potatoes (about 6 ounces), peeled and quartered/n/13. 1 medium carrot, cut into 1-inch pieces/n/14. 1 teaspoon kosher salt/n/15. 2/3 cup water/n/16. 2 tablespoons toasted shredded coconut/n/17. 2 tablespoons toasted blanched, sliced almonds/n/
Recipe.Instructions:
Make the rice:
1. Place the rice in a sieve and rinse under cold running water until the water runs clear. Set aside.
2. Melt the butter in a medium saucepan with a tight-fitting lid, over medium-high heat. Add the golden raisins, almonds, turmeric, cumin seed, coriander seed, cardamom pods, and cinnamon stick and cook, stirring, until toasted and fragrant, about 2 minutes.
3. Add the rice and cook, stirring, until toasted, about 1 minute more. Add the water and salt and bring to a boil.
4. Lower the heat and simmer, (wrap the lid tightly with a kitchen towel), cover, and steam until the rice is tender, 20 minutes.
5. Remove from the heat and let rest, covered, for 10 minutes. Fluff with a fork and set aside.
6. Meanwhile, make the vegetables. Melt the butter in a medium straight-sided skillet with a tight-fitting lid, over medium-high heat.
7. Add the onion and cook, stirring, until lightly browned, about 1 minute.
8. Add the garlic and ginger and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute.
9. Add the golden raisins, almonds, coriander seed, cumin seed, and cardamom and cook, stirring, until toasted and fragrant, about 2 minutes.
10. Stir in the cauliflower, green beans, potatoes, carrots, and salt.
11. Raise the heat to high, pour in the water, and cook, covered, for 4 minutes.
12. Uncover and cook, stirring, until the vegetables are tender and most of the water has evaporated, about 1 1/2 minutes more.
13. Add the rice to the vegetable mixture and, using a rubber spatula, stir to combine.
14. Season with salt to taste. Divide the vegetable-rice mixture among plates and top with some of the toasted coconut and almonds.
15. Serve immediately
Recipe.Extra: Preparation Time : 20 mins, Cook Time: 30 mins, Servings: 4 Adults
